After wandering around for a bit looking for a place to eat, we ended up here.  So glad we did.  The space is small, funky, charming as hell, and a really good combination of old and new.  The tapas were so good and "alternative" as advertised.  We went with the waitress's recommendation.  She was awesome.  Not your typical sweet, overly friendly waitress, but I kind of loved that.  Great spot.
